name: slaver
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of an animal) to allow liquid to come out of the mouth, especially because of excitement or hunger: The dog slavered with excitement when told it was time for a walk.
disapproving to show great interest or excitement in someone or something, in a way that is unpleasant to other people: Stop slavering over that guitar, Stephen!
